title: Walter the lazy mouse
creator_credit: Stanislaw Dulz, Doubleday Productions and Viking Films
brief_description: Based on the book of the same title by Marjorie Flack. An animated story about a lazy mouse who learns to provide for himself as he searches for his family which has moved without telling him. Illustrated by Cyndy Szekeres. Narrated by Bob Dishy.
